entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -14.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 3:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

Temperature: -14.4°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 51 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -22.4°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
